trophies.trophyDetail: Unlock all Trophies in Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited for this Trophy.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 1.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 1.5.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 2.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 2.5.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 3.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 3.5.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 4.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 4.5.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 5.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 5.5.
Complete Main Quest Chapter 6.
Complete all Aldmeri Dominion quest achievements.
Complete all Daggerfall Covenant quest achievements.
Complete all Ebonheart Pact quest achievements.
Discover and clear all caves and locales throughout the Aldmeri Dominion Territory.
Discover and clear all caves and locales throughout the Daggerfall Covenant Territory.
Discover and clear all caves and locales throughout the Ebonheart Pact Territory.
Discover and clear all six caves and striking locales in Coldharbour.
Explore and clear all 18 caves in Cyrodiil.
Reach Level 50.
Have stolen clothing from all your armor slots repossessed at the same time by a guard.
Become a Werewolf.
Become a Vampire.
Complete the Mages Guild series of quests.
Complete the Fighters Guild series of quests.
Destroy all of Molag Bal's generals that appear at the Dark Anchors.
Destroy every Dark Anchor in Tamriel.
Defeat all of the Public Dungeon champions in the Aldmeri Dominion.
Defeat all of the Public Dungeon champions in the Daggerfall Covenant.
Defeat all of the Public Dungeon champions in the Ebonheart Pact.
Defeat all the bosses throughout the Group Dungeons in the Daggerfall Covenant.
Defeat all the bosses throughout the Group Dungeons in the Aldmeri Dominion.
Defeat all the bosses throughout the Group Dungeons in the Ebonheart Pact.

Dominate the Alliance War battlefield and become Emperor of Tamriel. 

Long may you reign!
Learn all Alliance Racial Styles.
Learn all Rare Racial Styles.
Find all the Skyshards located throughout Tamriel.
Prove yourself a Master Angler completing the achievements listed below.
Earn a kill when below 5 percent health in the Alliance War or Battlegrounds.
Successfully escape a guard after choosing the "Flee" option in the Accost Dialogue Window.
Earn the rank of Recruit in the Alliance War.
Spend your first Champion Point.
Help capture a Resource (Farm, Lumber Mill, or Mine), and Keep in Cyrodiil.
Complete all quest achievements in Cyrodiil.
Eliminate the threat of the Serpent and his Scaled Court throughout all of Craglorn.
Complete the Imperial City Arena by slaying the Ringmaster and her monstrous servants.
Complete the Imperial City Temple event by defeating the Daedric Titan, Uzuruz.
Bring an end to Molag Bal's secret plot in the Imperial City.
Complete the Barathrum Centrata event deep beneath the Imperial City.
Gain 900 Tel Var Stones from a single gain.
Defeat all the Patrolling Horrors in the Imperial City.
Complete 27 unique quests in Wrothgar.
Complete quests, defeat bosses, and explore delves to become the Hero of Wrothgar.
Complete Wrothgar's main quests.
Conquer all challengers and earn the title of Maelstrom Arena Champion.
Collect all 20 relics for the House of Orsimer Glories museum.
Conquer all challengers in Veteran Maelstrom Arena.
Complete quests, defeat bosses, and explore delves to become the Hero of Hew's Bane.
Complete quest "Prison Break" in Hew's Bane.
Join the Thieves Guild by completing quest "Partners in Crime" in Hew's Bane.
Steal every treasure from Kari's Hit List and place them all within the Thieves Den.
Complete 1 heist for the Thieves Guild without being detected.
Assist each member of the Thieves Guild in resolving personal matters.
Complete quests, defeat bosses, and explore delves to become the Bane of the Gold Coast.
Join the Dark Brotherhood and complete the "Voices in the Dark" quest.
Complete the "Filling the Void" Dark Brotherhood quest in the Gold Coast.
Execute all targets listed in the Litany of Blood and collect your reward.
Complete each achievement associated with the Speaker's Black Sacrament contracts.
Aid each of the notable figures recently arrived on the Gold Coast.
Defeat Zatzu the Spine-Breaker, the Mighty Chudan, Xal-Nur the Slaver, and Tree-Minder Na-Kesh in the Ruins of Mazzatun.
Defeat Sithera, Khephidaen the Spiderkith, the Votary of Velidreth, Dranos Velador, and Velidreth the Lady of Lace in the Cradle of Shadows.
Defeat Tree-Minder Na-Kesh after first eliminating all other enemies in Ruins of Mazzatun.
Rescue all six of the Su-Zahleel Elders from the Ritual Chamber in Veteran Ruins of Mazzatun.
Defeat Velidreth in Veteran Cradle of Shadows without any party members dying in the catacombs.
Complete Veteran Cradle of Shadows and Veteran Ruins of Mazzatun.
Defeat the Assembly General and assist Divayth Fyr in stopping the flood of animunculi coming from the Halls of Fabrication.
Restore Lord Vivec's lost power, save Vivec City, and be named Champion of Vivec.
Complete quests, defeat bosses, and explore delves to become the Savior of Morrowind.
Find all 30 ancestral tombs in Vvardenfell, make a rubbing of the information they contain, and deliver these rubbings to Librarian Bradyn to discover the location of the lost Library of Andule.
Capture three enemy Relics in a single Battleground match.
Earn a medal score of at least 3,000 points in a single Battleground match.
Defeat Mathgamain, Caillaoife, Stoneheart, Galchobhar, Gherig Bullblood and his attendants, and the Earthgore Amalgam in Bloodroot Forge.
Defeat Morrigh Bullblood, the Siege Mammoth, Cernunnon, Deathlord Bjarfrud Skjoralmor, and Domihaus the Bloody-Horned in Falkreath Hold.

Defeat Mathgamain, Caillaoife, Stoneheart, Galchobhar, Gherig Bullblood and his attendants, and the Earthgore Amalgam without taking damage from the Molten Nirncrux flowing through Veteran Bloodroot Forge.
Defeat every boss without ever personally being struck by siege weapon fire in Veteran Falkreath Hold, including siege engines commanded by Morrigh Bullblood.
Use Galchobhar's Mantle Breaker attack to dissipate a Lava Ball fired by a Fire Shalk while in Veteran Bloodroot Forge.
Complete Veteran Falkreath Hold and Veteran Bloodroot Forge.
Collect and install all of the parts necessary to reconstruct the Precursor factotum.
Complete quests, defeat bosses, and explore delves to become the Hero of Clockwork City.
Complete the "To the Clockwork City" quest.
Complete the "The Light of Knowledge" quest.
Learn of things to come.
Defeat Saint Olms the Just, Saint Llothis the Pious, and Saint Felms the Bold in Asylum Sanctorium.
Defeat Lizabet Charnis, the Cadaverous Menagerie, Caluurion, Ulfnor and Sabina Cedus, and Orryn the Black and Thurvokun in Fang Lair.
Defeat Rinaerus the Rancid and Orzun the Foul-Smelling, Doylemish Ironheart, Matriarch Aldis, Plague Concocter Mortieu, and Zaan the Scalecaller in Scalecaller Peak.
Collect both of the necessary ingredients and cure Jorvuld Davaux of the cult's plague.
Defeat the Cadaverous Menagerie without anyone in your group taking damage from Volatile Fungi in Veteran Fang Lair.
Defeat Zaan the Scalecaller without being knocked back by her shield.
Complete Veteran Fang Lair and Veteran Scalecaller Peak.
Defeat Z'Maja, Siroria, Relequen, and Galenwe in Cloudrest.
Complete quests, defeat bosses, and explore delves to become the Savior of Summerset.
Stop the conspiracy sowing chaos through Summerset, protect the Crystal Tower, and forge a new alliance to restore the Isles to order.
Retrieve the 20 dangerous relics stolen from the Vault of Moawita.
Complete 50 Abyssal Geysers.
Research every Jewelry Trait at least once, regardless of whether from a ring or necklace.
Defeat the Wyrd Sisters, Aghaedh of the Solstice, Dagrund the Bulky, Tarcyr, and Balorgh in March of Sacrifices.
Defeat Archivist Ernarde without killing his first Hulking Werewolf ally in Moon Hunter Keep.
Defeat Jailer Melitus, Hedge Maze Guardian, Mylenne Moon-Caller, Archivist Ernarde, and Vykosa the Ascendant in Moon Hunter Keep.
Defeat Jailer Melitus without being damaged by Bloody Geysers in Moon Hunter Keep.
Defeat the Archivist without taking group member damage from Symbols of Xarxes in Moon Hunter Keep.
Complete Veteran Moon Hunter Keep and Veteran March of Sacrifices.
Complete quests, defeat bosses, and explore delves to become the Hero of Murkmire.
Complete the "By River and Root" quest.
Complete both Frostvault and Depths of Malatar in Veteran.
Complete both Frostvault and Depths of Malatar in Normal.
Complete quests, defeat bosses, and explore delves to become the Savior of Elsweyr.
Defeat Yolnahkriin, Lokkestiiz, and Nahviintaas in Sunspire.
Collect and restore all fragments of the Rithana-di-Renada, an ancient Khajiiti mural, for the House of Histories.
Kill 1 Dragon in the wilds of Northern Elsweyr.
Complete both Lair of Maarselok and Moongrave Fane in Normal.
Complete both Moongrave Fane and Lair of Maarselok in Veteran.
Complete "The Dragonguard" quest in Southern Elsweyr.
Complete the "Pride of Elsweyr" quest in Southern Elsweyr.
